reviews.title: Best Nepali food in Tokyo!
reviews.content: Finally found authentic Nepali momos in Japan! The dal bhat was perfect, just like home. The staff were friendly and spoke Nepali which made ordering easy. Highly recommend the sekuwa.

reviews.title: スパイスが効いていて美味しい
reviews.content: ネパール料理は初めてでしたが、スタッフの方が親切に説明してくれました。モモは日本の餃子とは違う味わいで新鮮でした。ランチセットがお得です。

reviews.title: Amazing butter chicken!
reviews.content: The butter chicken here is the best I've had in Japan. Rich, creamy, and not too spicy. The naan is made fresh in the tandoor and comes out perfectly soft. Great for a date night!

reviews.title: Authentic North Indian flavors
reviews.content: As someone from Delhi, I can say this is one of the more authentic North Indian restaurants in Tokyo. The biryani could use more spices but overall satisfied. The lunch buffet is great value.

reviews.title: 最高のフュージョン体験
reviews.content: インド料理とネパール料理の融合が素晴らしい。プレミアムラムモモは絶品でした。少し値段は高めですが、特別な日にぴったりです。

reviews.title: Perfect dosa in Tokyo!
reviews.content: Been searching for good South Indian food in Japan for years. This place serves crispy dosas just like in Chennai. The sambar and chutney are authentic. Filter coffee is a must try!

reviews.title: Authentic Newari cuisine!
reviews.content: Finally found a place that serves real Newari food! The khaja set was amazing with bara, choila, and all the traditional sides. Staff are from Kathmandu and very welcoming.

reviews.title: 京都でこんな店があるとは！
reviews.content: 祇園にこんな素敵なヒマラヤ料理店があるとは驚きでした。おまかせコースは芸術的で、日本の食材とネパールの料理法の融合が見事。記念日におすすめです。

reviews.title: Best budget Nepali food
reviews.content: Simple, home-style Nepali cooking at great prices. The family running it is from Pokhara and the food tastes like what you'd get in a local Nepali home. Cash only but worth it!

reviews.title: モモの専門店！
reviews.content: モモしか出さない潔さが良い。蒸し、焼き、スープ、色々な種類が楽しめます。ジョルモモは辛いけど癖になる味。新大阪駅から近くて便利。
